titleStmt.title: A most true report of the myraculous mouing and sinking of a plot of ground, about nine acres, at VVestram in Kent, which began the 18. of December, and so continued till the 29. of the same moneth. 1596 ...
titleStmt.author: Chapman, John, fl. 1596.

notesStmt.note: Imprint from STC, based on uncropped title page at the Bodleian Library.
Running title reads: Straunge remouing of ground, at Westram in Kent.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
